goblin_scout.name: Goblin Scout
goblin_scout.description: A small, aggressive goblin with crude armor and a rusty weapon.

forest_stalker_spider.name: Forest Stalker
forest_stalker_spider.description: A large, predatory spider that uses venom and cunning.

cultist_acolyte.name: Cultist Acolyte
cultist_acolyte.description: A robed figure crackling with dark energy.

cultist_brute.name: Cultist Brute
cultist_brute.description: A hulking bodyguard dedicated to the cult.
